title: How to Mash Bananas

steps.headline: Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.
Take out the banana "string" if you are making baby food.
steps.description: It's also helpful to remove or cut off both ends of the banana tips.

steps.headline: Use the bottom of a spoon or fork to press down on the banana.
steps.description: Continue this process until the banana is well mashed.

steps.headline: Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.
Take out the banana "string" and cut off both ends of the banana tips.
Slice the banana(s) into small chunks or pieces.
Place the pieces into a food processor or blender.
Blend or purée mixture until well mixed thoroughly.

text: Steps Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.  Take out the banana "string" if you are making baby food. It's also helpful to remove or cut off both ends of the banana tips. Use the bottom of a spoon or fork to press down on the banana. Continue this process until the banana is well mashed. Blend or Purée Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.  Take out the banana "string" and cut off both ends of the banana tips.  Slice the banana(s) into small chunks or pieces.  Place the pieces into a food processor or blender.  Blend or purée mixture until well mixed thoroughly.
